resources.string: Welcome to tutorials to how to root your phone
Swipe from the left of the screen to choose your device
Follow all instructions very carefully to ensure nothing happens to your device
If your phone not on the list of devices please provide feedback by emailing us with your phone name and model
If rooting is successful, please feel free to share this app with your friends
Important: \n\nPlease note that whatever happens to your phone is by your own doing and is not the app or developer\'s fault

Root my Phone is an app that helps a user to simply root his phone. When looking for something new in Android, many user look towards rooting their phone. Therefore \'Root my Phone\' gives step by step instructions on how a specific phone should be rooted.
Atinderpaul Kanwar is a future software engineer and developer of Root my Phone. He has lots of experience in programming languages
2) Save link and open on computer.
4) Enable USB Debugging (If you don\'t know how, you should not be rooting your phone)
5) Check if phone is showing up under \'Your Model Type\' tab
NOW NOTE THE LAST TWO STEPS DOWN, BECAUSE YOUR PHONE WILL REBOOT
Make Sure to do Steps: (1â€“4) on your phone.
1) Go to: https://www.asus.com/us/Phone/ZenFone_2_ZE551ML/HelpDesk_Download/ to download bootloader unlock tool.
2) Select Android as \'OS Type\' and click \'Utilities\'
3) Go to Unlock Bootloader section and click Global.
4) Follow Steps on App to Unlock Bootloader.
To check if bootloader is unlocked, when the phone reboots, it should be a white screen with a black ASUS logo.
